name: Dawn's Grove Showcase
description:
This is a song for an fake area in Pikmin 2 made by yours truly using Pikmin 2 soundfonts.

All music in Pikmin 2 has many variations, some of which being when you're near enemy, when your Pikmin are working on something, at sunset, or if you're playing as Olimar or Louie. I've let you mess with some of the variations of the music using this "game"(?)

I picture Dawn's Grove as a forested grove with the trees being cherry blossoms, maples, and wisterias. Very pretty.
